      • testExecute2

        public void testExecute2()
                  throws FatalError,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Test method for Buy.execute(CurrentUserAccounts, AvailableTickets). Test the execute method for the Buy class, by providing a buyer and seller that exists. The buyer provided must not have enough credit to complete the transaction. A Failed Constraint exception must result. This is the second of 5 execution paths.
        Throws:
        FatalError
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • testExecute3

        public void testExecute3()
                  throws FatalError,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Test method for Buy.execute(CurrentUserAccounts, AvailableTickets). Test the execute method for the Buy class, by providing a buyer and seller that exists. The buyer provided must have enough credit to complete the transaction. The seller must have 999,999.99 credit, with the sale resulting in an overflow. A Failed Constraint exception must result. This is the third of 5 execution paths.
        Throws:
        FatalError
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • testExecute4

        public void testExecute4()
                  throws FatalError,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Test method for Buy.execute(CurrentUserAccounts, AvailableTickets). Test the execute method for the Buy class, by providing a buyer and seller that exists. The buyer provided must have enough credit to complete the transaction. The seller must have zero credit. The transaction must specify that 2 tickets are purchased. The seller must only have 1 ticket available. A Failed Constraint exception must result. This is the fourth of 5 execution paths.
        Throws:
        FatalError
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • testExecute5

        public void testExecute5()
                  throws FatalError,
                         FailedConstraint,
                         java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Test method for Buy.execute(CurrentUserAccounts, AvailableTickets). Test the execute method for the Buy class, by providing a buyer and seller that exists. The buyer provided must have enough credit to complete the transaction. The seller must have zero credit. The transaction must specify that 2 tickets are purchased. The seller must only have 2 tickets available, and the transaction must complete successfully. This is the fifth of 5 execution paths.
        Throws:
        FatalError
        FailedConstraint
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • testGetTransaction

        public void testGetTransaction()
        Test method for Buy.getTransaction(). Tests the getTransaction method in the Buy class, by executing the method. This method is a simple accessor method with only one return call.
